works.title: Environment Protection & Sustainable Development
points: Afforestation and barren land restoration
Rainwater harvesting and rejuvenation of water sources
Plastic-free campaigns and solid waste management
Biodiversity conservation and environmental awareness

works.title: Forest & Wildlife Conservation
points: Wildlife protection and rehabilitation
Awareness programs in sensitive forest zones
Promotion of forest-based organic and herbal products

works.title: Education, Training & Research
points: Educational support for children in need
Digital literacy, libraries, and career guidance
Establishing research and skill development centers

works.title: Health Services & Medical Assistance
points: Organizing health check-ups (cancer, diabetes, thyroid, kidney, liver)
Ambulance and emergency support services
Mental health awareness, de-addiction and rehabilitation programs
Maternal and child healthcare initiatives

works.title: Women & Child Development
points: Women empowerment and self-defense training
Adolescent health programs and counseling centers
Shelter and rehabilitation for vulnerable women & children

works.title: Support to Armed Forces, Police & Youth Welfare
points: Assistance to families of soldiers and police personnel
Education and healthcare support for dependents
Youth leadership programs, self-defense, sports, and stress management camps

works.title: Tribal, Rural & Urban Development
points: Tribal welfare programs and livelihood promotion
Reviving traditional and cultural occupations
Skill-building and self-employment training for rural youth and women
